# The `InstDeleterIRStrategy` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Strategy that deletes instructions when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> is too large.

Definition at line 112 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getWeight() {#a7af0e4ae5d5b18203ace012d7aa077b6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t InstDeleterIRStrategy::getWeight (size&#95;t CurrentSize, size&#95;t MaxSize, uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.

The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of
distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when we start getting close to <code>MaxSize</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/irmutator-cpp/#l00157">157</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/irmutator-cpp">IRMutator.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["virtual"]}>

Mutators for each IR unit. By default these forward to a contained instance of the next smaller unit.
